title: AI evaluation
content: What are your thoughts on having ESA papers evaluated by AI as announced recently

comments.body: Buddy can i dm u? Missed orientation and wanted to know what they talked
Could you please link to the video and the timestamp when they talked about this?
Ah yes PES once again finding ways to experiment with its primary stakeholders.
Did I miss the orientation?? Cuz in the app it said only students of Computer Applications, Law, Management and a few others and Im in [B.Tech](http://B.Tech) Cse so I didn't go.
Even the questions were ai generated

AI generated questions, AI assisted evaluation.

Next at PES: AI professors
Bro off-topic, but can you make an introduction thread for different majors or smth, it feels like I'm the only commerce student on this subðŸ˜…
Just join bba/mba whatsapp group no, every major has their own WhatsApp grp afaik
